about_the_game:
"Angstraum" (lit. 'fear space') refers to a place or situation that induces fear or discomfort, often associated with a sense of threat or unease.

A walking simulator with horror elements, inspired by the Backrooms and anomaly games like The Exit 8.

Gameplay

Trapped in an endless loop of an old German railway underpass, you must use your memory to escape. Explore your surroundings, remember every detail, and watch for anomalies to find the exit.

Anomalies

Anomalies are changes in the original environment – sometimes subtle, sometimes deadly. Up to 50 unique anomalies await to be found. The further you go, the harder it becomes to recognize them or escape their threat.

The Path to Freedom

But not every section contains an anomaly. The decision lies in your perception:

  • Anomaly found? Turn back.

  • No change? Move forward.

Reach ten correct decisions and escape the loop. But beware: A single mistake – or your death – will send you back to the beginning.

Controls

Move:
WASD keys or arrow keys
(Gamepad: Left Stick)

Run:
Hold Shift
(Gamepad: RT / R2)

Interact:
E key, Left or Right Mouse Button
(Xbox: X or Y / Playstation: Square or Triangle)

Open Menu:
ESC key
(Xbox: Start or Menu / Playstation: Options)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060-6GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Sound output devices such as headsets, headphones or speakers are required to hear acoustic anomalies.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Sound output devices such as headsets, headphones or speakers are required to hear acoustic anomalies.

short_description: Angstraum is an oppressive horror game that traps you in a threatening, never-ending loop. Observe your surroundings, uncover deviant anomalies, and escape deadly threats to find the exit.
